parameters.filterByFormula:
=OR(
  FIND(LOWER("{{ $json.conversation_context.course_query }}"), LOWER({nombre})) > 0,
  FIND(LOWER("{{ $json.course_mentioned_normalized }}"), LOWER({nombre})) > 0,
  FIND(LOWER("{{ $json.conversation_context.course_query }}"), LOWER({normalized_name})) > 0
)

parameters.jsCode: return { json: $json }; // This preserves full original data for one branch.
return { json: $json };
const records = $input.all().map(item => item.json); return { json: { records } };
